page.title: 14THE NORTH ISLES SPORTS
page.content:
{The North Isles Sports}are held in Sanday every three years. Competitors from Stronsay and Westray come to the island with the{M.V. Orcadia}and return to their respective islands on the same day. When they arrive they are transported to the school for lunch and then to the playing field.
There are both{athletic events}and {football}and{netball}matches as well as{tug o' war.}There are two sections, one for schools and an open section. After the events trophies are presented to the captains of the winning teams.
During the afternoon a buffet meal is available in the Community Centre. The {sports were held in Sanday in 1984 and in Stronsay this year.
